name: Rush Slider
description:
This tiny game was made with a preset artkit by Kenney for the 2020 Miz Jam 1. I didn't have much time to spend in the game, so I couldn't make more levels or add music and sfx. Also it was my first time with Godot and I had to learn all the engine. Hope you like the game, and have fun!! ^^

What times did you take on the levels? Comment down below!!!

Devblog coming soon!!!
